books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.notes: A powerful classic about justice and prejudice.

books.author: George Orwell
books.notes: Thought-provoking and chillingly relevant.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.notes: Witty characters and timeless romance.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.notes: Heard it's a defining coming-of-age story.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.notes: A perfect adventure to start with Middle-earth.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.notes: Important commentary on censorship and knowledge.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.notes: Seems challenging but rewarding.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.notes: Epic scope, need to set aside time for this one.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.notes: The benchmark for epic fantasy.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.notes: Deep psychological exploration.

books.title: Don Quixote
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes
books.notes: Considered one of the first modern novels.

books.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
books.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
books.notes: A mesmerizing multi-generational story.

books.title: The Stranger
books.author: Albert Camus
books.notes: Concise and impactful existentialist work.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.notes: Fascinating perspective on human history and society.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.notes: Hilarious and absurdly clever.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.notes: Complex world-building, ecological themes.

books.title: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.notes: Classic sci-fi series about predicting the future.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.notes: Incredible and inspiring story of overcoming adversity.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.notes: Beautiful nature writing combined with a compelling mystery.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.notes: Heard it's as good as The Martian.
